textos_fuente.text: Owner â€“ Topsider Accommodations 2-Bedroom Amenities Travel Guide Contact Book Now Owners 00Â°F Owner Personal Owner Portal For account-specific information such as your ownership records, or to pay maintenance fees online, go to the administrative site and log in with your Owner ID and personal password. Call 305-664-8031 if you do not have a password or need help logging in. Personal Owner Portal General Owner Resources For general owner information and materials such as newsletters, board meeting minutes, and generic documents, go to the Owner Pages and login with the site password. Call 305-664-8031 if you do not have a password or need help logging in. Owner Resources NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING January 21, 2024, at 10:00 a.m. Interval Calendar Interval Calendar 75500 Overseas Highway Islamorada Florida 33036 United States Office: 305-664-8031 Reservations: 305-664-8031 Fax: 305-664-9331 Explore Accommodations Amenities Why Book Direct Travel Guide Contact Careers DMCA Privacy Policy Capital Vacations is dedicated to creating memories for all members, owners and guests. This includes complying with current accessibility legislation and providing accurate information regarding accessible facilities, amenities, and aids at the resort. This facility is an â€œexisting facilityâ€ under the Americans with Disabilities Act and neither guest rooms nor public spaces provide accommodations that meet current accessibility standards. If you have additional questions or concerns about the physical features of this facility, please contact us at 305-664-8031 . We believe technology should empower everyone. Topsider Resort by Capital Vacations is dedicated to ensuring the accessibility to and usability of https://topsiderresort.com for our website visitors with disabilities. Our effort to provide an inclusive website experience for all users is an ongoing process. If at any time, you have questions or concerns regarding the accessibility of any page on https://topsiderresort.com, you may contact us at adacompliance@capitalvacations.com . In your email, please provide specific details about the accessibility issue, including the exact URL of the web page in question. Upon receipt of your email correspondence, our team will carry out any reasonable actions to make the page accessible for you. The implementation of accessible features will include those standards specified by the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA). Â© 2025 Topsider Resort. All rights reserved. Proudly managed by Capital Vacations Resort Management. The Capital Vacations Resort Management logo is a trademark of Capital Vacations. Made with â¤ï¸ in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina. ğŸ‘ï¸ Privacy Policy Capital Vacations, LLC (the â€œCompanyâ€) has a strong commitment to providing excellent service to all of our customers and visitors of this website, including respecting your concerns about privacy. We understand that you may have questions about how this website collects and uses the information that you provide to us. We have prepared this statement ("Statement") to inform you of the privacy principles that govern this website. Your trust and confidence are our highest priority. If after reviewing this Statement you have any questions or privacy concerns please send an e-mail to privacy@capitalvacations.com or send a letter to: Website Privacy Att: Director of Brand 2024 Corporate Centre Drive Myrtle Beach, South Carolina 29577 United States ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ’» Privacy of user information We collect only the pertinent information necessary to enroll you as a member or process your transactions. We do not otherwise sell, rent, or give away your information to unrelated third parties except in cases where you specifically request it or approve it, however, we may share your contact information with our affiliate partners and their subsidiaries who may engage in marketing, advertising and promotional activities.  Note however that you will never be tricked into signing up for anything. Options to receive more information will always be clearly explained to you and your participation in any promotion is optional. ğŸš˜ Travel and other Services and Products To provide you with a single source for purchasing travel services and discounted products and services, we have entered into agreements with select reputable industry partner companies that provide inventory/services directly or aggregate inventory/services from suppliers. If you choose to make a booking on this website, it is necessary for you to provide personally identifiable information to execute the purchase. This information is then provided directly to or through our partners to the suppliers (e.g., resorts, cars, cruises, golf courses) for processing.  By contract, these parties and suppliers that we deal with directly are required to keep your personally identifiable information secure while processing your transactions. Once you have initiated a transaction with a supplier, your personally identifiable information may be subject to that supplier's privacy policy. The Company has no control over suppliers' privacy policies and practices. ğŸª The Use, Storage and Security of Information Our website uses "cookie" technology. "Cookies" are encrypted strings of text that a website stores on a user's computer. Our website requires the use of a cookie throughout the online reservation process. Without cookies we will not be able to keep information you enter on multiple pages together. For example, unless the Company can remember the dates you used in your resort search, we will not be able to check availability. Cookies also enable us to customize our website and offerings to your needs and provide you with a better online experience on the Company. We do not use cookies to ascertain any personally identifiable information about you apart from what you voluntarily provide us in your dealings with the Company. Cookies do not corrupt or damage your computer, programs, or computer files. You may set your browser to block cookies (consult the instructions for your particular browser on how to do this), although doing so will adversely affect your ability to perform certain transactions, use certain functionality and access certain content on our website. ğŸ’³ Third-Party Services The Company is engaged with third-party servicers in order to perform some of the services related to payment processing. The Company may disclose your personal information to third parties, as may be required, in order for us to provide you access to services related to payment processing. Only information that is directly relevant and necessary to process your transactions will be shared. The Company partners with third-party payment processors in order to facilitate payment for certain services and goods found on the Companyâ€™s website. The Company may disclose your personal information to third-party payment processors for the following purposes: to facilitate the processing of payment cards used to process your payment to provide assistance in resolving disputes (e.g., billing or transactional disputes) to prevent, detect, mitigate, and investigate potentially illegal acts, fraud and/or security breaches As stated above, we do not disclose your personal information to third-party payment processors for their marketing and advertising purposes. ğŸ’¬ Conditions of contact by the Company As a registered Company user and after you process your online booking, you'll receive our e-mail newsletter and any other offer information that you request. You may receive e-mails associated with your activities on the site such as travel confirmations, updates to your itinerary, and information associated with other trips you have taken or requested as an answer in response to your inquiry. You may also receive communications via Text Messaging Service, including multiple reoccurring messages (messaging and data rates may apply). Customize your message-based interactions by replying to messages with keywords: â€œSTOPâ€ to opt out of the messaging service; â€œRESUMEâ€ to opt back in; or â€œHELPâ€ to receive assistance with the messaging service. As mobile access and text message delivery is subject to your mobile carrier network availability, such access and delivery is not guaranteed. Consent to these terms is not a condition of purchase. ğŸ”— Advertising and third-party links Some the Company advertisers, affiliate partners and their subsidiaries may request information directly from you, or link to sites that do so. We do not endorse or have control over content or policies of third-party websites. The Company is only responsible for the privacy policy and content of this website. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the use of cookies on websites that you have accessed this Website from and to the non-Company websites that you may access from this website. ğŸ” Information Accuracy or Opt-Out We are interested in maintaining the most current and accurate information about each of our visitors and customers. If you have provided personal information to us in the past and have moved or changed email addresses, please let us know. If you would like to stop receiving communications or services feel free to email us at privacy@capitalvacations.com . Please put "Remove" In the subject line. ğŸ™‹ Questions or Concerns If you have any questions, please contact us using our contact page located at the following link. Contact Page Close copyright DMCA Capital Vacations, LLC respects the intellectual property rights of others and expects its users to do the same. It is Capital Vacations, LLC's policy, in appropriate circumstances and at its discretion, to disable and/or terminate the accounts of users who repeatedly infringe or are repeatedly charged with infringing the copyrights or other intellectual property rights of others. In accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998, the text of which may be found on the U.S. Copyright Office website at https://www.copyright.gov/legislation/dmca.pdf , Capital Vacations, LLC will respond expeditiously to claims of copyright infringement committed using the Capital Vacations, LLC website (the "Site") that are reported to Capital Vacations, LLC's Designated Copyright Agent, identified in the sample notice below. If you are a copyright owner, or are authorized to act on behalf of one, or authorized to act under any exclusive right under copyright, please report alleged copyright infringements taking place on or through the Site by completing the following DMCA Notice of Alleged Infringement and delivering it to Capital Vacations, LLC Designated Copyright Agent. Upon receipt of the Notice as described below, Capital Vacations, LLC will take whatever action, in its sole discretion, it deems appropriate, including removal of the challenged material from the Site. DMCA Notice of Alleged Infringement ("Notice") Identify the copyrighted work that you claim has been infringed, or - if multiple copyrighted works are covered by this Notice - you may provide a representative list of the copyrighted works that you claim have been infringed. Identify (i) the material that you claim is infringing (or to be the subject of infringing activity) and that is to be removed or access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit us to locate the material, including at a minimum, if applicable, the URL of the link shown on the Site where such material may be found, and (ii) the reference or link, to the material or activity that you claim to be infringing, that is to be removed or access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit us to locate that reference or link, including at a minimum, if applicable, the URL of the link shown on the Site where such reference or link may be found. Provide your mailing address, telephone number, and, if available, email address. Include both of the following statements in the body of the Notice: "I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that the disputed use of the copyrighted material or reference or link to such material is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law (e.g., as a fair use)." "I hereby state that the information in this Notice is accurate and, under penalty of perjury, that I am the owner, or authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of the copyright or of an exclusive right under the copyright that is allegedly infringed." Provide your full legal name and your electronic or physical signature. About Us | Vintage Oaks Realty Call Us Today! 830-256-0634 Click to Call Properties Sell With Us Relocation Specialists About Vintage Oaks Community Connect with a Vintage Oaks Expert Today! 830-256-0634 Tap to Call Properties Sell With Us Relocation Specialists About Vintage Oaks Community About Us About Vintage Oaks Realty Vintage Oaks Realty is comprised of aÂ group of accomplished real estate professionals committed to expert service in the Texas Hill Country. Representing both buyers and sellers of Hill Country homes, land and home-lot packages, our team of skilled brokers and agents share a common goal of providing the best real estate service in the industry. Todd Richert, Director of Realty Sales Todd Richert serves as Director of Real Estate Sales for Vintage Oaks Realty. During his 10+ years in the real estate industry, Todd has amassed critical sales and management experience in all aspects of real estate including residential properties, land, vacation/resort homes and bulk acreage tracts. Todd has earned a level of success rarely seen in the industry. A graduate of the University of Texas, Todd has a license in five states and currently holds a Texas Real Estate Brokers License. Viki Wernert, RealtorÂ® A state licensed realtor for 15 years and a Texas Hill Country resident for more than three decades, Viki Wernert hasÂ extensive real estate and local knowledge. Prior to her real estate career, Viki was a manager of the historic Gruene Hall, a must-see for anyone visiting the area and a true landmark in the growing city of New Braunfels. Viki holds a bachelorâ€™s degree from Texas State University and is well versed in all aspects of residential land and home sales. Email: Viki@VintageOaksRealty.com Cell: 830-708-1625 Terre Collins, RealtorÂ® Terre Collins has spent more than 20 years in the real estate industry, gaining experience in property management, mortgage financing and residential land and home sales. A Texas licensed realtor and Hill Country resident for a decade, Terre has a keen expertise in real estate and the communities that make up the Texas Hill Country. Email: Terre@VintageOaksRealty.com Cell: 830-214-3263 Angela Walls, RealtorÂ® Angela Walls is a native Texan and has been in the Hill Country area since 1979. She has 20+ years of experience in the real estate industry. Her honest and trustworthy reputation exceeds her in the community and among her piers, making her the professional needed to insure a smooth transaction.Â Â  She is a past President of her Board of Realtors and was voted Realtor of the Year in 2012. Her strong work ethic is dedicated to her clients and their real estate needs, proving that personal integrity does bring success in todayâ€™s Real Estate World. She specializes in waterfront, residential, new construction, farm and ranch, commercial, and acreage. Email: Angela@VintageOaksRealty.com Cell: 830-822-1847 Contact Us See What Our Customers Have to Say Donnie Home Buyer I had heard that buying a home was a bad experience â€“ that it was too stressful. I feel that our experience was the complete opposite because of Vintage Oaks Realty! Sharon McCaskill and Pam Beierlein Coldwell Banker Your Open House was such a success and it truly blew our minds! It was one of the most professional events we have ever been a part of and the flow of the event was perfect. All of our agents picked up quality clients from the event. Ruby Home Buyer This was our first home purchase and Viki made the experience very easy and stress free! She was on top of everything and was super organized. About The Community Vintage Oaks is a 3,900-acre master-planned residential community located in the Texas Hill Country in New Braunfels, TX, between San Antonio and Austin. On behalf of the HOA management team and Board of Directors, we are delighted to welcome you to the Royal Oaks community. Whether youâ€™re a new resident just settling in or a long-time neighbor, weâ€™re thrilled to have you as part of our vibrant and caring neighborhood. Royal Oaks is more than just a place to live, itâ€™s a community built on shared values of respect, friendliness, and active participation. Our goal is to support each resident and foster a welcoming environment where everyone feels at home. Here, youâ€™ll find everything you need to stay informed, get involved, and enjoy all that Royal Oaks has to offer. From community events and neighborhood news to important resources and support, weâ€™re here to help you make the most of your experience. We encourage you to connect with your neighbors, attend upcoming meetings and events, and share your ideas and feedback. Together, we can continue to nurture a safe, beautiful, and thriving community for all. What Youâ€™ll Find Here: Community News & Updates: Stay informed about upcoming events, meetings, and important announcements by subscribing to the Royal Oaks Newsletter Eblast. Documents & Forms: Access bylaws, meeting minutes, architectural guidelines, deed restrictions and more. Payment Portal: Easily manage your HOA dues and view your account status at www.townsq.io Maintenance Requests: Report issues for common areas quickly & efficiently by emailing dr@pmghouston.com . Contact Information: Reach out to your HOA management team by email or phone during office hours, Monday through Friday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. Getting Started: New Homeowner/Tenant Orientation: Orientations are scheduled Monday through Friday, from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM (45-minute sessions) here at our HOA office located at 11231 Richmond Avenue Suite D111 Houston, Texas 77082. Please submit your warranty deed, first page of the closing disclosure, and/or lease to @access@pmghouston.com Review our community guidelines to help keep our neighborhood safe and welcoming. Subscribe to join your neighbors on upcoming events of the community. Check out the Residentâ€™s tab. Weâ€™re here to support you and ensure Royal Oaks remains a wonderful place to live. If you have any questions or need assistance, please donâ€™t hesitate to contact us. Welcome home! How to Structure your Staff Team. It is strange how we operate on theâ€¦ | by Roonie | Netcord Articles | Medium Sitemap Open in app Sign up Sign in Medium Logo Write Sign up Sign in Netcord Articles Â· Netcord is your Daily Dose of Discord. Read as the aspiring Discord community shares their tips on Community building, management, moderation, and so much more! How to Structure your Staff Team It is strange how we operate on the same platform without knowing a thing about each otherâ€™s staff structure Roonie 3 min read Â· Apr 15, 2022 -- Listen Share Press enter or click to view image in full size Thumbnail: jsph#9999 Moderation is necessary for every Discord server. I personally run a 11k Discord server and I have never seen the staff channels of my friends Discord servers and they havenâ€™t seen mine. But who knows what goes under the hood? How do we form a system so perfect and efficient? We just have to wait long enough to figure it out ourselves. This trial and error method feels kind of a waste of time doesnâ€™t it? How many Moderators do I need? You may have asked yourself this question previously. Whatâ€™s the answer? It depends on your server activity level. â€œDoesnâ€™t member count matter?â€ My old 100 member server can overtake my new 11,000 server in terms of activity any day. Funny enough, we didnâ€™t even need moderators back then. Because we werenâ€™t a community server. Just a few no life friends talking day and night. That is why server theme matters more than member count. The amount of members on your server, one way or the other, relates to your activity. 3ï¸âƒ£ Start with three. I think three is a good place to start. Always remember, just because theyâ€™re active in chat doesnâ€™t mean they are good moderators. Demoting someone is more work and trauma. Hire smartly instead. For the first batch, consider getting some of your discord-experienced friends As your activity starts to grow, and when you get outnumbered, or chat is active in the uncovered part of the time zones, that is when itâ€™s time to get new staff members. Roles Structure Hereâ€™s my staff team role structure: Admin Moderator Trial Mod Management Pretty basic right? It does the job. â€œManagementâ€ is the base staff role for all moderatos as a part of them being in the team. Have an administrator for around every 5 moderators. Unless you chose to have Senior Moderators. Staff Channels Structure: A private #staff-chat and #staff-commands is necessary. Whatâ€™s also worth implementing is a #staff-guide handbook so new moderators know exactly how moderation works in your server. Mention in there what violations cause what type of punishment. A private #staff-news channel doesnâ€™t sound like a bummer. You can use it to update moderators on various announcements only staff needs to know. You can also have a #staff-suggestions to let you staff members suggest different things to be implemented into the server. Proof of Violation: A channel for moderators to post the mod action they made against a user. They shall also mention why they punished the user along with a screenshot. Discord themselves recommend keeping track of mod cases manually. If you are a server owner, feel free to ask for suggestions or feedback on Netcordâ€™s Official Discord server! Weâ€™d love to help you out. I was alone when setting mine up, you donâ€™t have to! Thank you for reading â€” see you tomorrow! Discord Discord Moderation Moderation Community -- -- Published in Netcord Articles 84 followers Â· Last published Aug 28, 2022 Netcord is your Daily Dose of Discord. Read as the aspiring Discord community shares their tips on Community building, management, moderation, and so much more! About Us | Royal Oaks EVENTS Blog Careers Resident Login Ã®Â†Â‚ SALES AND MARKETING: 623-208-6621 GENERAL INFORMATION: 623-246-4985 CAREERS: 623-323-9728 Sales and Marketing: 623-208-6621 Ã¯Â„ GENERAL INFORMATION: 623-246-4985 CAREERS: 623-323-9728 Schedule a tour Close X Home Inspirata Pointe Expansion Inspirata Pointe Expansion Ã¯Â„Â‡ IP Floor Plans IPÃ‚Â Calculator IPÃ‚Â Events IPÃ‚Â Renderings About Us Ã¯Â„Â‡ Meet Our Team Sun City Foundation Aventur Team Lifestyle Ã¯Â„Â‡ Services & Amenities Health & Wellness Dining Activities & Clubs Volunteering Tech & Innovation Testimonials Independent Living Ã¯Â„Â‡ Floor Plans Cost Calculator Contracts & Fees Life Care Health Services Ã¯Â„Â‡ Assisted Living Memory Care Supportive Living Gallery Contact Events Blog Careers COVID-19 Resident Login x + + + Hitting It Off On a Personal Level Is Always A Good Start. When youÃ¢Â€Â™re discovering someone (or something, like a retirement community), you naturally want to know more about them. Like what makes them special. What they believe in. What makes them a leader. Royal Oaks first opened in 1983. That fulfilled the vision of founders Dr. J. Davis Illingworth and Roe Walker who desired a different kind of destination for seniors. One that offers highly purposeful and engaged living. That fosters an elevated sense of community, where residents quickly become lifelong friends. This realized vision continues to grow through an expanding campus that is continually distinguished by its amenities, living and support services, and legacy of leadership. A record of financial strength that translates to better living for Ã¢Â€Â” you. There is a reason for this point of differentiation. We are a non-profit. That means we operate with the sole purpose of providing distinctive living to seniors. That status is made even stronger through our People of Faith Foundation, Inc., a 501(c)(3) tax-exempt entity that has been operating and growing for over 35 years. Our non-profit status and our foundation allow us to beautify the campus, provide additional services, along with providing financial assistance to our residents. The careful stewardship of our expanding financial resources continues to enable us to grow from a position of confidence and certainty. The financial management and stability we are known for not only is a comfort to our residents, but enables our leadership team to shape an exceptional future Ã¢Â€Â” for Royal Oaks and for you. Learn More about the foundation Royal Oaks Growth Through The Years. New structures Additional land 50+ acre campus 258 Independent Living apartments 82 Independent Living garden homes 59 Assisted Living apartments 56-suite Memory Care Center 57-suite Complete Supportive Living building Inspirata Pointe campus expansion Ã¢Â€Â” 156 stunning new apartments and villas A Clear Mission Defines Us. Empowering people to live an engaged, inspired, vibrant life. A Far-Reaching Vision Drives Us. Inspiring Passion. Connecting People. Strong Values Guide Us. Focus on healthy well-being Promote a culture of compassion Develop and strengthen meaningful connections Foster a caring, dedicated professional staff Encourage innovation Plan for the future Commit to fiscal responsibility Sun City: The Living And Nearby Attractions CouldnÃ¢Â€Â™t Be Brighter. When exploring a new place to live, location is undoubtedly a prime consideration. Sun City consistently comes out on top. The location ranks exceptionally high in areas such as livability, amenities, and cost of living. In addition, the city is an ideal hub for all your travels, whether that means a quick day trip or a full vacation getaway. Sun City itself offers a steady calendar of local concerts, festivals, and sports. ThereÃ¢Â€Â™s a rich cultural scene of art, music, theater, and performance. And then thereÃ¢Â€Â™s the boundless array of shopping and restaurants. Discover More About Sun City Our Leadership Team Is Incomparable. First and foremost, we are in the people business. That is evidenced by the special people who lead and elevate Royal Oaks. They live our mission and personify our character. They build on the foundational pillars of engaged, inspired retirement living that define our community. Each member of our leadership team brings years of high-level experience, and several more years at Royal Oaks. They are genuine, caring, and their go-to method of operation is to go above and beyond Ã¢Â€Â” every time. MEET YOUR LEADERSHIP TEAM Is It A Job When You Love Making Lives Better? ItÃ¢Â€Â™s all about making a difference in peopleÃ¢Â€Â™s lives. ThatÃ¢Â€Â™s what being here is all about. WeÃ¢Â€Â™re experts at making life more enriching for seniors. We do the same for our employees. When you join Royal Oaks, you become part of a larger family that includes your colleagues, management, leadership, and our residents.
